title.rendered: R1 RCM Global Pvt Ltd collaborates with Smile Foundation by supporting its Mission Education programme

content.rendered:
R1 RCM Global Pvt Ltd collaborates with Smile Foundation by supporting its Mission Education programme

At Smile Foundation’s Mission Education Centres in Gurugram, Haryana, and Noida, Uttar Pradesh, 400 children, many of whom are first-generation learners, are receiving invaluable benefits.

Thanks to the generous support from R1 RCM, these centres have become a comforting second home for these young minds, where they are nurtured with both education and healthcare. The centres have fostered a child-friendly environment that not only facilitates academic growth but also encourages creative expression, dance, singing, and joyous celebrations.

Dedicated teachers utilize innovative teaching and learning materials to impart knowledge and broaden the understanding of various subjects among these young learners. By employing interactive methods, they ignite a passion for earning and a thirst for knowledge within these bright souls.

The impact of Smile Foundation’s Mission Education Centres is truly profound, shaping a better future for these deserving children and breaking down barriers that hinder their progress. It is all made possible by the unwavering support and dedication of partners like R1 RCM.

R1 RCM Global Pvt Ltd collaborates with Smile Foundation for Skilling Project

For the past four years, R1 RCM has extended its support to four skill development centers located in Hyderabad and Delhi. Through their dedicated partnership, these centers have successfully trained numerous youths, equipping them with valuable skills and knowledge. Moreover, with the assistance provided by R1 RCM, a considerable number of these trained individuals have secured meaningful placements, paving the way for a promising future. The unwavering support from R1 RCM has played a vital role in empowering these youths and facilitating their journey towards professional success.

R1 RCM Global Private Limited

 

R1 RCM Global has partnered with Smile Foundation and since the last two years is supporting two Mission Education centers located in Gurugram & Noida. With their support 400 underprivileged children are going to school and sustaining their education.

The team of employees is highly enthusiastic at R1 RCM and often participates in employee volunteering activities held at both the centers supported by them.

R1 RCM is a leading provider of revenue cycle services and physician advisory services to healthcare providers. We help transform and manage the commercial infrastructure of care organizations throughout the country.
